user.biography:
Santa Rosa pub: Daily 11-9:30 
Windsor pub: F/Sat 11-10, W/Th/Sun 11-9, M/T Beer Garden only (no food) 4-8, Windsor Gift Shop Daily 11-8

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Russianriverbrewingofficial on September 03, 2021. May be an image of drink.

node.text:
This weeks’ online offerings are now available including a fresh batch of “wet-hopped” Dribble Belt cans plus a new mixed case of our classic RRBC sours! Orders will ship Tuesday and Wednesday next week due to the Holiday. Both pubs open all weekend including Labor Day! #dribblebelthoppypaleale #happyhops #plinytheelder #blindpigipa #stspils

https://www.shop.russianriverbrewing.com/collections/bottles-cans

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Russianriverbrewingofficial on September 02, 2021. May be an image of indoor.

node.text: So far we have over 100 pounds of freshly picked “wet” hops in the kettle with more to come! This small 20 barrel batch of HopTime will have nearly 200 pounds of hops added before even going to the fermenter,  where we also dry-hop with even MORE wet hops! Brewers Sean and Ben are having fun brewing this special beer for their first time. Vinnie first brewed HopTime in 1999 when RRBC was still at Korbel and he was growing hops on the winery property. Look for HopTime on draft and in cans at both pubs and online later this month (small batch so not enough for distro). It smells soooo good in the brewery today! @craneranchhops @norcal_hop_growers_alliance #hoptimeharvestale #rrbccrew

Photo by Russianriverbrewingofficial on September 02, 2021. May be an image of 1 person and dog.

node.text: It’s HopTime!  @craneranchhops harvesting Cascade, Bitter Gold, CTZ, and Comet hops. Once we pick them from the bines (not vines), Vinnie and I will drive them straight to the Santa Rosa pub to be added to this year’s HopTime Harvest Ale brew! @norcal_hop_growers_alliance #sonomacountyhops #sonomagrown #hoptimeharvestale

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Russianriverbrewingofficial on August 31, 2021. May be an image of drink.

node.text: Just canned a new batch of Dribble Belt, our low ABV hoppy session Pale Ale! This batch has a new twist- it is dry-hopped with freshly picked wet Cascade hops from Alexander Valley Hops farm in Healdsburg!  When I poured it, I immediately noticed a bright, fresh hop aroma, strong head retention and nice lacing on the glass. The addition of wet hops to this #rrbccrew favorite is a hit, well at least for me! On tap and in cans tomorrow at both pubs as well as online this Friday! @avhops #dribblebelt #sonomacountyhops #sonomacountygrown

node.text:
Harvest is in full swing here in Sonoma County! We will be heading out to @craneranchhops in Santa Rosa later this week to pick hops and brew HopTime Harvest Ale with fresh, wet hops right off the vine! HopTime will be available at both pubs on draft and in cans late September. In the meantime, grab a beer and check out this great story in @sonomamag on the reemerging local hop farming scene! 
https://www.sonomamag.com/hops/
#hoptimeharvestale #sonomacountyhops #sonomagrown #cascadehops #bittergoldhops #comethops

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Russianriverbrewingofficial on August 28, 2021. May be an image of indoor.

node.text:
Although we sold out of the Peach Beer at both pubs last night, we still have a great selection of draft, bottles and cans to enjoy here or take home! Some of my current favs are this year’s “It Takes A Lot Of Great Beer To Make Great Wine”, Mosaic Stack, and Velvet Glow which is perfect on a hot Summer day like today. Join us at our pubs this weekend for cold beer, lively conversation, tasty food and air conditioning! #greatbeergreatwine #velvetglow #mosaicstack #craftbeer #rrbcsantarosa 
https://www.russianriverbrewing.com/santa-rosa-beers/

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Russianriverbrewingofficial on August 27, 2021. May be an image of 1 person and drink.

node.text:
This weeks’ online offerings are now up including a fresh batch of Velvet Glow Helles bottled this week! Small Batch Peach Beer is also available now at both pubs ONLY, 2 bottle limit per person.  We do not have enough to sell online, and the beautiful custom bottles simply don’t fit in the shipping box! Great excuse for a trip to Beer and Wine Country. 🍻Cheers! #plinytheelder #blindpigipa #stspils #velvetglow #intinctionpinotnoir #intinctionsauvignonblanc #consecration #propitiation 

https://www.shop.russianriverbrewing.com/collections/bottles-cans

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Russianriverbrewingofficial on August 26, 2021. May be an image of food.

node.text: Our long-awaited 2020 Small Batch Peach Beer is finally being released tomorrow! The base beer is Temptation (sour blonde aged in Chardonnay barrels) with 6 pounds per gallon of fresh peaches from @drycreekpeach ! This is our very first sour peach beer and was made purely out of necessity. About 1 year ago, the owners of Dry Creek Peach Farm in Healdsburg called Vinnie to ask if we wanted any peaches as they were being evacuated from their home and farm due to the encroaching Walbridge Fire. He said bring everything you have and we will figure it out. We spent the next couple of days halving beautiful ripe peaches to be added to Temptation for a secondary fermentation. The end result was this gorgeous beer which is just like biting into a fresh peach, skin and all! Thankfully our friend’s farm and home were spared and they were able to return the following week. This beer was a Cellar Society release but we made a little extra to share!  Available tomorrow at both brewpubs and Gift Shops ONLY for a limited time. 2 bottle limit per person! #smallbatchpeachbeer #temptation #drycreekpeach #rrbccrew

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Russianriverbrewingofficial on August 23, 2021. May be an image of drink.

node.text: Thank you to everyone who helped us support the California Craft Brewers Association by enjoying our version of the CCBA Brewers Collaboration!  With your help, we raised $12,500 for the CCBA to aid in their ongoing efforts to promote, protect and advocate for our craft brewing community! I proudly served on the CCBA Board of Directors for 9 years, only recently terming out. So this collaborative fundraising effort holds an extra special place in my heart. 😊 Cheers to #cacraftbeer ! #ccbabrewerscollab @cacraftbrewers

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Russianriverbrewingofficial on August 20, 2021. May be an image of drink.

node.text:
It’s that time of year again when harvest is in the air and local winemakers crave a cold beer at the end of a long, hot day! This year’s “It Takes A Lot of Great Beer To Make Great Wine” is a hoppy, hazy pale ale with notes of stone fruit, pine and eucalyptus. Available on tap and in bottles NOW at both breweries as well as online for shipping next week!  Cheers! #greatbeergreatwine #plinytheelder #blindpigipa #stspils #craftbeer 

https://www.shop.russianriverbrewing.com/collections/bottles-cans

node.text:
Greetings from Portland, Maine!  Vinnie and I are eating lobster rolls and drinking Allagash White for every meal on our first vacation since I don’t know when!  This weeks’ online offerings are now available.  Have a great weekend, everyone!
